hero_section.structure: Full height (min-h-screen), centered typography, subtle background video or dark image with heavy overlay.
elements: H1: 'Tu marca, visible en todos los mundos.'
Sub: 'Estrategia digital + Plataforma comercial física. El nuevo estándar para marcas de moda.'
CTA: Primary Gold Button 'Potenciá tu marca'

platform_section.structure: 50/50 split. Left: Text/Value Prop. Right: Immersive Image of Showroom.
platform_section.overlay: Gradient overlay to ensure text readability if text overlaps.

plans_section.structure: 4-column grid. Cards have a subtle gold border glow on hover.

buttons.primary: bg-[#d4a968] text-black hover:bg-[#e8c891] px-8 py-4 text-sm tracking-widest uppercase font-bold transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#d4a968] text-[#d4a968] hover:bg-[#d4a968]/10 px-8 py-4 text-sm tracking-widest uppercase font-bold transition-all duration-300

cards.base: bg-[#121212] border border-white/5 p-8 hover:border-[#d4a968]/30 transition-colors duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden

badges.gold: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-[#d4a968]/30 bg-[#d4a968]/10 px-3 py-1 text-xs font-medium text-[#d4a968]

assets.icons: Use lucide-react. Thin stroke (1.5px). Gold color for accents.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. PRESERVE: Keep the existing Navbar and Footer components. Do not rewrite them unless necessary for responsiveness.
2. THEME: Enforce the Dark Theme (#0a0a0a) globally for this landing page.
3. TYPOGRAPHY: Use 'Playfair Display' for all Headings (H1-H3) and 'Manrope' (or system sans) for body text.
4. GRID: Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the Studio section exactly as defined in layout_strategies.
5. INTERACTION: Add subtle hover effects to the Plan cards (border glow).
6. CONTENT: Update the copy to reflect the 'Agency' pivot. Do not use 'Store' terminology in the Hero.
7. MOBILE: Ensure all grids collapse to 1 column on mobile. Images must have max-height constraints.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
